```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
age <- read_csv("Data/boroughs-by-age.csv", col_types = 
                  cols(.default = col_double(),
                       group = col_character() ))

age_long <- pivot_longer(data = age, 
                         cols = -group, 
                         names_to = "county",
                         values_to = "count") 
  #mutate(type = map(county, 
                   #  ~ str_split_fixed(., pattern = "_", n = 2)))
map(age_long, ~ separate(data = age_long, col = county, into = c("county", "type"), sep = "_"))


```
